title: Corki is outclassing AP Mid laners
body:
{{champion:42}} got poke with his r, waveclear with qer, free TLD proc on e, safety/mobility with his w, extreme good roaming with package, and he has the 500 dmg auto attack that every "assasin vs mage" argument will bring up.

The only thing he lacks is some cc, but that is all. he does mix dmg so building {{item:3155}} will not completely counter him. he is ranged so he can cs very safely and he can build lifesteal and crit/attackspeed which no mage can! he can take down tower very quick, and isnt as mana reliant as most ap mages.

Seriously he is one of the most picked champion in LCS and he is way more often a mid laner than adc. if a team got cc from top jg and support they will simply take corki and he will perform much better than 90% of the mages. there is literally no down side of having Corki mid instead of an ap mage, and sieging/counter sieging with a corki is so good. 

**TL;DR: Something should be done to put corki back in the bot lane**
